title: To busy
text:
It was overcrowded. I've never seen so many people on this kind of attraction.

Special thanks to lady Mia, she is some kind of "police" over there. I can tell you she ruin my visit that day with her very rude behavior. I don't have clue how someone like that cloud work with tourists. Authority should have evaluation of her job.

title: Don't go there
text:
Old, small, not really clean rooms, miniature TV, WiFi didn't work ...... I traveled a lot and I never had bad experience with hotels like this one.
For the manager of this hotel, please do something about this negative reviews not just copy paste reply
Thanks
